items.sentence: Do you really think that Tom will be able to help Mary?
Do you think Tom still has many friends left in Boston?
She felt so humiliated that she couldn\'t say anything.
You were lucky that you didn\'t get caught in the rain.
Are there any direct flights between Boston and Sydney?
Could you keep an eye on my suitcase for a few minutes?
Do you remember what time we were supposed to be there?
How did you know that Tom wouldn\'t be able to do that?
How long has it been since you\'ve seen your boyfriend?
What\'s the name of the piece the orchestra\'s playing?
